name: Corn-Crusted Catfish
keywords: buttermilk, catfish, cornmeal, crusty bread, fish, low calorie, low-fat, main course

recipeInstructions.text: Wash, dry and cut catfish in half. Soak in buttermilk until ready to cook.
Mix cornmeal, flour and cayenne. Drain catfish and dredge.
Heat oil in heavy skillet. Saute catfish on both sides over medium heat in hot oil, about seven minutes total. Serve with crusty bread.
